entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Ottawa (Kanata - Orléans)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:23 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow and Blowing Snow, -7.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Ottawa Macdonald-Cartier Int'l Airport 6:00 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow and Blowing Snow
Temperature: -7.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.3 kPa rising
Visibility: 8.1 km
Humidity: 78 %
Wind Chill: -17
Dewpoint: -10.6°C
Wind: SSW 33 km/h gust 56 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow this evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 gusting to 50 after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 7 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 7 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Clearing. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
